郩字的基本解释

郩
xiáo
古地名。
古同“崤”，山名。

郩
ǎo
古邑名。

郩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiáo］
［《集韻》何交切，平爻，匣。］
(1)地名。
(2)山名。在河南省西部。
[②]［ǎo］
［《廣韻》烏晧切，上晧，影。］
邑名。

郩字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郩； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1273第02
【集韻】胡交切，音肴。【玉篇】邑名。　又【集韻】山名。在弘農。　又【廣韻】烏皓切，音襖。邑名。

郩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
郩字的起名意思

暂无。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
xiáo
Ancient place names.
In ancient times, "崤", the name of the mountain.
Xi
ǎo
Ancient town name.
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiáo］
["Ji Yun" He cross-cut, flat line, box. ]
(1) Place name.
(2) The name of the mountain. In the west of Henan Province.
[②]［ǎo］
["Guangyun" Wu Hao cut, upper Hao, shadow. ]
The name of the town.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Youji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郩; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1273 02
[Ji Yun] Hu Jiaoqi, sound and delicacy. 【Jade articles】The name of the town.　[Jiyun] The name of the mountain. In Hongnong.　[Guang Yun] Wu Hao cut, sound jacket. The name of the town.
